param.name: log_error
param.label: Log error message
param.description: If set to Yes, error messages will be logged to a file (in the /logs directory)

param.name: log_alert
param.label: Log alert message
param.description: If set to Yes, alert messages will be logged

param.name: log_debug
param.label: Log debug message
param.description: If set to Yes, debugging messages will be logged

param.name: log_info
param.label: Log information message
param.description: If set to Yes, informational messages will be logged

param.name: sharedmemory_cache_handler
param.label: Shared memory cache PHP engine
param.description: Select desired PHP shared memory cache engine. The engine may be used by shLib query cache (see below) or by other extensions such as sh404SEF

param.name: enable_query_cache
param.label: Enable db query cache
param.description: If set to Yes, and appropriate PHP libraries are installed on the server, a transparent database query cache will be activated

param.name: enable_joomla_query_cache
param.label: Enable Joomla! db query cache
param.description: If set to Yes, and db query cache above is on, a databases query cache will also be activated for db operations performed through the Joomla! database layer

param.name: sharedmemory_cache_host
param.label: Shared memory server host
param.description: Only for standalone cache servers such as memcache/memcached. Enter host address of the server (no http:// in front of it)

param.name: sharedmemory_cache_port
param.label: Shared memory server port
param.description: Only for standalone cache servers such as memcache/memcached. Enter the port the server is listening to
